sourcesContent:
<template>
<v-row>
  <!-- Live PGM window + Layout controls + video feeds -->
<v-col
cols='8'
>
<v-card 
color= "#232323"
height="60vh"
>
<v-card-title class="justify-center">
Live PGM window

<v-expand-transition>
	<video  width="90%" controls v-if="loading === false">
		<source :src="active.src" :type="active.type">
	</video>
</v-expand-transition>
</v-card-title>
</v-card>
<v-card 
color="secondary"
height="10vh"
>
<v-card-title class="justify-center">
Live Layouts
</v-card-title>
</v-card>

<v-card 
color="primary"
height="25vh"
>

<v-card-title class="justify-center">
Live Feeds
</v-card-title>
</v-card>
</v-col>

<!-- CG live keys -->
<v-col
cols='1'
>
<v-card 
color="secondary"
height="95vh"
>
<v-card-title class="justify-center">
CG Keys
</v-card-title>
</v-card>
</v-col>

<!-- GFX managment window -->
<v-col
cols='3'
>
<v-card 
color="primary"
height="95vh"
>
<v-card-title class="justify-center">
GFX managment section
</v-card-title>
</v-card>
</v-col>

</v-row>
</template>

<script>

// eslint-disable-next-line object-curly-newline
import { mdiPoll, mdiLabelVariantOutline, mdiCurrencyUsd, mdiHelpCircleOutline } from '@mdi/js'


export default {
  components: {
    
  },
  
  mounted() {  
    document.title = "WebMixer";  

  },  
  setup() {
    return {
    }
  },
data() {
		return {
			loading: "warning",
			videos: [],
			selected: 0
		};
	},
	computed: {
		active() {
			return this.videos[this.selected];
		}
	},
	created() {
		setTimeout(() => {
			this.videos = [
				{
					src: "https://www.w3schools.com/html/mov_bbb.mp4",
					type: "video/mp4"
				}
			];
			this.loading = false;
		}, 3000);
	}

  }
</script>

<style>
body {
    background-color: #2e2e2e;
}
</style>
